Sentencas: La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 (LSC) based Ru catalysts are very active in methane steam reforming.
Titulo: Evidence of anti-coking behavior of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 as potential anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed under methane

Sentencas: Nevertheless, they can be easily poisoned under water-deficient conditions.
Titulo: Evidence of anti-coking behavior of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 as potential anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed under methane

Sentencas: Ru can be deposited as metallic ruthenium particles decorating the LSC grains or be inserted as Ru ions in the perovskite structure.
Titulo: Evidence of anti-coking behavior of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 as potential anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed under methane

Sentencas: Both Ru-promoted LSC catalysts were studied in methane steam reforming under water-deficient conditions and characterized after testing.
Titulo: Evidence of anti-coking behavior of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 as potential anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed under methane

Sentencas: Catalytic activity tests showed that ruthenium metal species are deactivated under water-deficient atmosphere, while ruthenium species inserted in LSC presented a remarkable stability and catalytic activity where residual steam plays a key role.
Titulo: Evidence of anti-coking behavior of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 as potential anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed under methane

Sentencas: Very unreactive carbon species responsible for deactivation were detected by temperature-programmed oxidation and transmission electron microscopy over metallic ruthenium species.
Titulo: Evidence of anti-coking behavior of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 as potential anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed under methane

Sentencas: Such species were not observed when ruthenium species are inserted and stabilized into the LSC structure.
Titulo: Evidence of anti-coking behavior of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 as potential anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed under methane

Sentencas: La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 appears therefore as a highly promising anti-coking anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed with methane or natural gas and operating under water-deficient conditions.
Titulo: Evidence of anti-coking behavior of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.98Ru0.02O3 as potential anode material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed under methane
